org.owasp.esapi.waf
Class WAFTestUtility

java.lang.Object
  org.owasp.esapi.waf.WAFTestUtility

public class WAFTestUtility
extends Object

This class holds a number of static utilities to make writing WAF test cases easy. Definitely not useful for anything other than testing.
